item.title: EP 806 - The Roasted Baby: Urban Legend Or Black Magic Conspiracy?
item.itunes:title: The Roasted Baby: Urban Legend Or Black Magic Conspiracy?
item.description:
Today we dive into the urban legend of the roasted baby and find out it is real and far more frightening!

https://www.syracuse.com/us-news/2016/03/naked_texas_woman_high_on_meth_put_daughter_in_oven_to_heal_her.html

https://heavy.com/news/2016/03/tasha-hatcher-glen-rose-texas-mother-mom-puts-child-baby-in-oven-burns-facebook-photos-video-family-daughter/

https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/local/daily/sept99/microwave.htm

https://abc13.com/oven-death-baby-killed-burnt-to-houston/1091992/

https://web.archive.org/web/20020803035005/http://www.elizabethotte.com/poemfor.htm

https://www.dailypress.com/news/dp-xpm-20010521-2001-05-21-0105210004-story.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khun_Chang_Khun_Phaen#Synopsis

http://thailand-charms-amulets.blogspot.com/2013/02/accumulate-abundance-of-wealth-in-your.html

https://www.nbcnews.com/id/wbna40269486#.T7ZOLfJoVBk

https://www.irishexaminer.com/news/arid-20194381.html

Roasted Fetuses In Luggage: Chow Hok Kuen Intended Gold-Leafed Corpses For Ritual, Cops Say

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/roasted-fetuses-luggage-chow-hok-kuen-gold-leaf-corpses-thailand_n_1536361

Briton arrested in Thailand after being found with six roasted human foetuses

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/asia/briton-arrested-in-thailand-after-being-found-with-six-roasted-human-foetuses-7766232.html

Why Was A British Man Trying to a Smuggle a Bag Full of Roasted Fetuses into Taiwan?

https://www.gawker.com/tag/chow-hok-kuen

Briton of Chinese origin arrested with six fetuses

https://seattle99.wordpress.com/tag/chow-hok-kuen/

404

https://www.bangkokpost.com/thailand/local/207088/police-arrest-suspect-in-foetus-scandal
